formalpara.title: Movie 2
formalpara.para: Embryo carrying a GFP-PIE-1 fusion protein (Reese et al., 2000) imaged using dual time-lapse DIC and fluorescence microscopy from the one-cell stage until the four-cell stage. One image was captured every ten seconds, and the movie is played back at 10 frames per seconds (overall, 100 times faster than actual events). The DIC and GFP signal (pseudocolored in blue) are overlaid. The embryo is approximately 50 μm long and anterior is to the left.
